generated_body: The article titled "Powerful side-by-side portraits show people over 100 years old next to their younger selves" is likely to present a collection of compelling photographs that juxtapose elderly individuals with images of themselves from their youth. Readers may expect to learn about the stories behind these portraits, including insights into the lives and experiences of the subjects over the decades. The article could also explore themes of aging, the passage of time, and how personal history is reflected in these visual comparisons, offering a thought-provoking look at how we perceive aging.
